name: react-vite-microfrontend
description: Micro-frontend architecture with React and Vite

scripts.dev: npm run build:remotes && concurrently "npm run dev:shell" "npm run preview:remotes"
scripts.build: npm run build:remotes && npm run build:shell
scripts.build:remotes: npm run build:mf1 && npm run build:mf2
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:shell && npm run install:mf1 && npm run install:mf2
